StringTable.Label: EnslavedColonyCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides the basic needs for shielded planet.

StringTable.Label: EnslavedColonyCapital_Dec
StringTable.String: Colony capital that is imprisoned under an Ur-Quan slaveshield. Disallows building a shipyard. Colonial capital does a little bit of everything and serves as a stepping stone to greater things.

StringTable.Label: FreeColonyCapital_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Colony that has had its Ur-Quan slaveshield removed.

StringTable.Label: FreeColonyCapital_Dec
StringTable.String: Colony that has had its Ur-Quan slaveshield removed. The population feels uplifted after this event. Colonial capital does a little bit of everything and serves as a stepping stone to greater things.
